This place didn't wow us.  Service was alright.  Not overly friendly but not abrupt either.  The food was alright.  My favourite dish was the padron peppers.  Perfect!  The razor clams were too gritty.  I was spoiled from this morning's experience.  The bombas were okay.  My husband liked them better than I did.  We also tried the anchovy with fried bone.  Not bad.  The free olives were actually pretty good.  The prices were fair.  All in all, it was A-OK.
